intro: Scholtzia tenuissima, commonly known as the slender scholtzia, is a flowering plant native to the western United States. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its small, daisy-like yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun. It has narrow, linear leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. Scholtzia tenuissima is a hardy perennial that is well adapted to arid and semi-arid environments.
